name: Manam Menu Component
description: Bottom navigation menu component for mobile apps with a prominent central action button. Features a dark theme with purple accents, rounded selected states, and an elevated central button.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the component

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of menu items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item

label.description: Display label for the menu item

icon.description: Icon SVG string or icon name/emoji for the menu item

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled

centralButton.description: Optional central button that appears elevated in the middle of the menu

id.description: Unique identifier for the central button

label.description: Display label for the central button

icon.description: Icon SVG string or icon name/emoji for the central button

disabled.description: Whether the central button is disabled

activeId.description: ID of the currently active menu item
